statements: DELETE FROM players WHERE player_id = 101 AND age >= 25;
DELETE FROM players WHERE position = 'Forward' AND age >= 30;
DELETE FROM players WHERE name LIKE 'J%' AND age < 25;
DELETE FROM players WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM players WHERE age > 30 AND position = 'Forward';

DELETE FROM teams WHERE team_name LIKE 'A%' OR team_name LIKE 'B%';
DELETE FROM player_teams WHERE player_id IN (SELECT player_id FROM players WHERE age < 25);
DELETE FROM team WHERE team_id IN (SELECT team_id FROM player WHERE age > 30);
DELETE FROM contracts WHERE team_id = 5 AND contract_start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM teams WHERE coach_name = 'John Doe';
